website_summaries.verdict: A quality jewelry box with a unique design. A charming tale behind the brand name adds an air of romance to this piece.
pros: Wood construction is durable and exceptionally sturdy
Metal hinges do a superior job of holding the lid up when open
Features an aesthetically pleasing modern finish with an understated metal clasp
cons: If you have a well established jewelry collection, this medium sized jewelry box may not be large enough

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant medium size jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I got this in gray for my mom as a Christmas gift, and it looks a lot more expensive than it is - it is very elegant looking. The materials seem to be high quality and the box looks just like in the pictures. I made a video for you to see how easy the parts get together and added some photos of details. It comes in a cloth bag which makes it perfect for gifting. The mirror is real, and the hinges are metallic, making the top stay up with no problem. It is a great product for the price, and I am thinking of getting myself one too!
customer_reviews.author: Jct

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a jewelry box and the color of this one caught my eye. I took a risk to order since there was no review. when i got it, I was extremely pleased with it. the box is well wrapped in a white gift box. it is so elegant and beautiful. not big size but with two trayer and enough comparments to store all my earrings, rings and necklaces. It even has a very delicate key to keep safe. Check the video for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item today and I LOVE it! It is high quality material and craftsmanship. Fits all my jewelry perfectly
customer_reviews.author: M. G

customer_reviews.title: Great, Compact Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry box! It is beautiful and well-made. I like that it is small and compact as I am trying to scale back my amount of stuff. I did take out the little inserts for earrings, etc. as I felt the space was better used without it. This was such a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: lil_Jess87

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, elegant, and very functional! Super happy with my Vlando jewelry box.
customer_reviews.author: Josica Koopman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I'm don't own a lot of jewelry, but I was looking for a quality box to house the pieces I have. This was perfect. It's sturdy and perfectly sized. The style is simple and compliments the furniture in the room. The only concern I had was that the box had a strange smell when I first got it. However, it is only faint now. I'm sure it will be completely gone in no time. I can see myself using this jewelry box for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Yes I will buy again, different color next time
customer_reviews.text: Yes I am very satisfied and my little girl is very happy with her new jewelry box. Big enough, lot of room, beautiful and you can buy aways as a gift for all 10 and up girls as a gift, very good price under $30
customer_reviews.author: Ulia

customer_reviews.title: Not a wooden jewlery box
customer_reviews.text: First off I am annoyed that the title is deceiving. I received this today and was disappointed it was not "wooden". I was under the impression it was wood with a gray stain or gray finish. It is not. It may have a wooden core, but the box is covered in gray "pleather", or fake leather/vinyl material. Now, that being said, I am keeping the box. Though it is not what was expected, it is a nice jewelry box with nice compartments and will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: jenndavidson

customer_reviews.title: Cute Presentation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my niece. When it arrived I thought the presentation (after the shipping box :) ) was adorable, and something my niece will love. It came in a container with cute, thick ribbon like handles, and you lay it down and pull out a box (like, a dresser drawer), then the jewelry box is there, inside of a nice, canvas tote bag. The box itself was just as expected! Good quality, the peacock green color is beautiful and nice storage options! It's nice that this includes a mirror, and the inclusion of a key to lock up goodies is something my niece will love!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Spurling

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE everything about this. It is very nice for the price. I would buy again as a gift. The color was exactly as I had hoped. The packaging it came in was beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Litvin

customer_reviews.title: COMPACT AND GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: Cutest packaging ever! Came in the box pictured and inside a soft bag. Gorgeous and decently sized, exactly as described and expected! Lock works perfect and key is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bunker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic find!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancée loved this. It's sophisticated and an elegant looking box. It's much larger than expected as looks nice on the dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box was actually really amazing but I returned it only because it wasn't big enough to fit all my jewelry. If you have minimal jewelry and don't plan on expanding your collection, then this will be perfect. I will say that the mirror is nice, although a bit useless because the box only opens up 90 degrees and you will have to lift the box up, or bend down to use it lol
customer_reviews.author: Lily P

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jewelry box!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly like what you see in the pictures! Beautifully packaged. My only comment is I wish they would give an extra key. Otherwise happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Good quality. Love how it’s organized and that it comes with necklace holders, jewelry cloth, and large foam piece. I know the foam piece was just to protect the mirror during shipping, but I left it in as it keeps everything in place when I have to tilt it to put it up in the top of my closet and to get it down.
customer_reviews.author: Niki P

customer_reviews.title: just the right size
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my niece. the gray color made it perfect for any room and was classy. I added some jewelry to the box as part of the gift and she was thrilled. i might order one for me. Very well made and should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: LRM

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for small jewelry collection. Exterior is lightly padded, interior has nice mirror, lots of different spaces with soft surfaces for different types of jewelry. This box has room for rings, earrings, watches, necklaces, bracelets, pins, etc., but does not have much space for large chunky jewelry like big bead necklaces.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice/Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. I have a larger jewelry box but this one is perfect to have on my dresser. It holds the jewelry I wear most often. It is well made and the color is very pretty. The inside seems plush and keeps necklaces separated. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MMcCurdy

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing my earrings
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect, affordable jewelry box. I have a ton of big and small stud earrings and I'm able to fit all of them in here and keep them safe! I use the top middle compartment for hoops and sometimes stick my stud earrings into the cushion part. I also love it because it looks super cute on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Saleena

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old daughter wanted something that is not "baby like", because she's a big girl now ;-). This was great! I ordered the pink and it is beautiful! It is perfect for her. It has plenty of room and looks very elegant. Just what she wanted. The material and hardware is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love the gray color, looks very sophisticated on my dresser. Has the perfect amount of space for someone with a moderately sized jewelry collection, the tray included helps to add storage space. Initially had wanted a wood box but this is so pretty and really the perfect size so I'm happy I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wooden but.........
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! But you should know that this wooden jewelry box is covered in some sort of plastic leather. But it doesn’t look cheap or plasticky but more like a Serafino leather
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to give as a gift and it's perfect. I am happy and confident in giving this to my friend who could use some extra storage for her jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Oceangal

customer_reviews.title: This jewelry box is exactly what I was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is exactly what I was looking for. It is a very stylish piece that is displayed on my dresser. I don't own much jewelry so it was big enough for everything that I have. Also, you are able to remove partitions inside the jewelry box to make it fit what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: but I love using it for my jewelry when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Not enough storage for all of my jewelry, but I love using it for my jewelry when traveling. At home, I use it for items of sentimental value. Very Chic.
customer_reviews.author: Micahlyn Vaage

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful!  Well made, and just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I love this Jewelry box, the material doesn't look cheap at all, the glasses are very nice, the jewelry compartments are just the right size, I don't own lots of jewelry but it definitely has place for me to buy some more. I also put 3 watches there and there is enough space :)
customer_reviews.author: Mpina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It has become so difficult to find a jewelery box in stores if its not around the holidays. This one was just what i needed. Fresh, clean look matches my room perfectly and holds all the items I hoped for. Just as described and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: WOW - A++ Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after looking at a higher end brand with a similar design. Vlando popped up as an Amazon suggestion, and I thought for $36 - why not? I am absolutely floored at the quality of this jewelry box. I bought for use while traveling, and I plan to purchase a larger one for use at home. It’s beautiful and so functional! Very pleasantly surprised. I’m so glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney Watson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful jewellery box
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewellery box! It has so many compartments and the design is so elegant! And it looks so beautiful on my dresser now! love everything about it. I got the teal green and the colour is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.They should just double check when packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant looking. Was very pleased to show this to my mother for my sisters Christmas gift. Unfortunately there was a brown poop looking smudge on the earring holder that she was quick to point out (its very ligh colored interior and "It" definitely showed) Maybe I could have pretended like I hadn't seen it by putting it back in its packaging however we bought jewelry to gift her within it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and very classy looking.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the different size compartments which make for easy organizing. Very nice finish and classy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cummins

customer_reviews.title: she never had something like this before
customer_reviews.text: This Jewlery box is my wife's first ever, she never had something like this before. When she opened up the box, she was very happy about the quality and it's one of her favorite colors. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: The Man

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and elegant looking. My granddaughter loved it, and I could tell by the way she explored it that she thought it must have been very expensive. She is 13, and this is her first jewelry box. Her decor and favorite clothing colors change on a regular basis. The grey box was a perfect choice for her since it will go well with however she decides to decorate her room.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I THINK IT IS BEAUTIFUL AND I AM GLAD I PICKED THIS OUT OF ...
customer_reviews.text: MY GRAND-DAUGHTER IS GETTING MARRIED. SHE REGISTERED WITH AMAZON. THE JEWELRY BOX WAS ON HER LIST. I PURCHASED IT. I THINK IT IS BEAUTIFUL AND I AM GLAD I PICKED THIS OUT OF HER REGISTRY. KATIE BORDEN
customer_reviews.author: Billie D. Berdon

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and elegant jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and elegant jewelry box. Enough space for all my jewelry (although, I do not own many pieces). Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great small jewelry case
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect jewelry case. It is a little small and isn't good for necklaces, but fits more than I expected. would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nik Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, expensive-looking jewelry box!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed, especially for the price point! Comes in a sturdy box, pretty color, nice quality, perfect size for the top of My dresser. Varied and convenient storage options for various jewelry items. Really a lovely item that looks more expensive than it is. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nora Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING quality!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING quality! Looks like it is over $100. Soft inside and love that the middle lifts up. Would be a great bridal gift or just a gift. I cannot tell people enough how much I love it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Fallin

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a Fantastic Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: My husband got the jewelry box for me as a Christmas gift. It is absolutely perfect. It had multiple compartments for my rings, earrings and bracelets. It’s the perfect size too. Everything fits. Plus the color was absolutely beautiful. I love the fact that it locks too. It’s the perfect jewelry box and it looks great on the dresser. It’s a great buy! And it’s made extremely well....
customer_reviews.author: TheCrowHouse

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I needed more space for jewelry as my other box was overfull and cluttered. This is a very nice little box, especially for the price; a good value. I thought, for the price, the material was good and I would be willing to give it as a gift. I did not speak to durability as I have just started to use it. It is not a large box so watch the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Hebert

customer_reviews.title: It is better than pictured
customer_reviews.text: It is better than pictured. Come with nice gift box and dust bag. Nice gift. Only drawback is the inside room is a little packed.
customer_reviews.author: miggie

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is so cute! it has the perfect amount of space for me and helped me get rid of a lot of my crappy jewelry. I love all the little compartments and how nice it looks! I kind of wish I got the greenish color because I got the light blue and I just like green a lot but either way I'm really happy with what I got!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little box....
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as an awesome gift for 8-10+ year old child, also for their friend’s birthday gift and to a niece for Christmas. The key lock is ‘key.’ I’m guessing it also works as a functional small jewelry box for anyone. It is probably of a much higher quality than most similar boxes... and great packaging as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this quality for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Luxury jewelry box, perfect gift for any age, well made, sturdy, detailed. Comes with a key that could easily be turned into a necklace for the receiver. Colors are amazing. Overall happy with purchase, what gives it a 5 star for me is the packaging it comes with, very very stunning detail.
customer_reviews.author: andres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mother’s Day gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother for mother’s day. It comes so nicely packaged for gifting and the quality is great. I want one for myself! I hope she will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present win!
customer_reviews.text: My aunt asked for a semi small table top jewelry box for Christmas and this is what I found! It was the perfect size and exactly what she wanted. There was plenty of room for her rings, earring and bracelet!
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: After buying my young granddaughter an expensive pair of earrings for Christmas, I bought this jewelry box to store them. It’s the perfect size for her dresser. Very nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DSB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter’s birthday. The packaging was incredible, like a gift to be opened. The color was the same as advertised. Very pleased with this purchase. Granddaughter loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Dark Blue
customer_reviews.text: This was very high quality and the price is unbelievably great for what you get. I ordered the darker blue and it was beautiful. Very nicely packaged. Gave as a gift and everyone at the party was very impressed and wanted to know where I got this so they could buy one. My daughter and I both want one, so now I have Christmas gift ideas!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Blacketor

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I always had a problem where to keep my jewelries. This box sold out my problem. U can’t fit there a lot of stuff neither u can fit there a big bijouterie, but for gold or silver small sized items this box is perfect. I also think that it s a good Christmas gift. Bc we women have a lot of stuff that we do not know where to put haha
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality & Design
customer_reviews.text: Delighted and surprised how lovely and elegant this little jewelry box is! It comes in a wonderful dust covered drawstring protective bag, a fabulous sturdy carry storage box. The bottom is covered with a nice felt, the locking key works perfectly and the interior design is well constructed..It's everything described and pictured, it will last for years. It's absolutely beautiful! I will be purchasing more for the rest of my grand-girls. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is beautiful/ aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: This lockbox is beautiful, sturdy, & great for bracelets, rings, & earrings. It also comes in nice colors, I had the Aqua green one and it added a nice pop of color. I personally had to return bc I have a lot more necklaces than I thought & needed to accommodate them better. Vlando has other great products including a bigger box that holds necklaces. I would definitely buy it as a gift! If you have majorly rings and earings this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little jewelry box and I’ve now purchased four products from this vendor. All of them have been very nice, well though out and functional as well as beautiful. I will be buying more from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jewelry box for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a jewelry box that was spacious enough for my moderately sized jewelry collection but compact enough to fit in my dresser drawer. This checked off every requirement I was looking for. There's plenty of space to store everything you need and the lining is so soft, there's absolutely no chance that your jewelry will be damaged. Would definitely recommend this for yourself or a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jewelry box and very good quality. We purchased it for our granddaughter to put her nice jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a present placed rings and other jewelry for teenager. Worked well. Color bought in gray and it matches so many decors.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it came in a beautiful box and the jewelry box itself was even more beautiful. It feels sturdy and well constructed so I hope it lasts for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Seemingly sturdy jewelry box.
customer_reviews.text: More sturdy than the jewelry box I bought for my 5 yr old granddaughter two months ago. Replaced it with this. Hope it lasts longer than the unicorn one.
customer_reviews.author: nanna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great size unless you have a ton of jewelry. I have a medium amount and I love this box because it forced me to keep my best stuff only and get rid of the stuff I don't wear. Nice design and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made case
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful case! Very well made. I wish it was bigger to fit more of my jewelry, but would work well for someone with a small jewelry collection!
customer_reviews.author: RPalme2

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is amazing. It's super sturdy, well made and the faux leather is good quality. Plus it comes with a carry case/bag if you wanted to take your jewlrey box along for travel.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Matches listing exactly.
customer_reviews.text: Actually a pretty nice product. Looks exactly like the photos in the listing. Doesn't seem cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this jewelry box!!! Wish is were just a little bigger!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Crane

customer_reviews.title: The quality and then the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jewery box for my 13 year old granddaughter for Christmas. When it came in the mail I opened and checked it out and was really surprised at the quality. Also very appealing to the eye. But the best part was when she opened up the gift and the expression on her face was like WOW..... well done. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Diane little

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great and I love all the compartments so I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at Stackables at Container Store but they were triple the cost and this jewelry box does it all! The quality is great and I love all the compartments so I can organize my jewelry. The box is a little small so I just keep my smaller jewelry items in it and other items are hanging. Buy this if you want something organized and sleek looking!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Rikelman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jewelry box for my daughter for Christmas. It’s made well and has plenty of storage. My daughter loved it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Loved this jewelry box when I received.  It will make a beautiful gift.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this jewelry box. It is very well made and looks very expensive without the cost. It will definitely make a really nice gift for someone special. It shipped very quickly and was packed well. If you're on the fence about ordering, I would give it a try, You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: It was a great gift for newly wed , it is very elegant for the price paid , i bought 3 of them to gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sabbysou

customer_reviews.title: Cute and looks good
customer_reviews.text: It is a great little jewelry box for my young daughter. I keep her hair stuff and little bit of jewelry she has
customer_reviews.author: Brigette Anne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Nice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and nice sturdy jewelry box. My wife loves it. Has a lot of little compartments. Keeps everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been needing a jewelry box for a while. I am so pleased with this one. It was a great buy. I have no complaints and I totally recommend buying it!
customer_reviews.author: KET

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES her birthday gift! 💜
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a birthday gift directly to my daughter, so I have not seen it myself. She is VERY HAPPY with this jewelry box. FIVE STARS 😊😀😊😀😊
customer_reviews.author: Blanche in TN

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and it smelt at first.
customer_reviews.text: The box had a light chemical smell that only went away after putting it in open air for 3+ days. Not too strong though - the kind I'd ignore if it comes from an Ikea desk or something, but obviously it's less tolerable for jewelry holders. It's also bulky for the number of pieces it can hold. I'd return it but already thrown out the package. Alas, at least it's cheap and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good !!
customer_reviews.text: Very good. First of all it doesn’t look cheap at all. The quality is good and inside also nicely designed. It looks like I can use it for a long time. I’d consider this item for a gift. Just It could be a little bigger as I have several bold big earrings.
customer_reviews.author: ga-young kim

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of this box. It was shipped quickly and came in a nice bag which I also kept. The box itself is strong, and well made. There's no gaps to lose jewelry in, and I love the little mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Camanda

customer_reviews.title: Great jewelry box!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my sister and she loved it! Really good quality jewelry box that has plenty of storage space!
customer_reviews.author: Yeshua's Beloved

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Really nice jewelry box. Thought it would arrive and I’d be disappointed. I’m surprised it’s really nice for the price. I’d definitely buy another if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a letdown.
customer_reviews.text: Product had a tear on one side of the sleeve case that the jewelry box came in and was dirty. Had no time to return the product because gift came day of party so I had to make due with it.
customer_reviews.author: Luddie

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice small jewelry box that looks more expensive that it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice small jewelry box that looks more expensive that it is. Looks classy and most importantly it's functional. This would make a nice gist. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mora

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute and functional jewelry box!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice jewelry box that felt modern and functional. This one is perfect! The pink color is so pretty. Would make a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For my lady
customer_reviews.text: She doesn’t own a lot of jewelry so this is perfect... side note I think I need to buy her more jewelry...
customer_reviews.author: amazingbooks!

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Thought it’s gonna be more spot. Not really convenient for my jewelerly , probably need something bigger. But I like quality and color
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this jewelry box! It looks just like the picture and it is the perfect size for my jewelry collection! It’s super sturdy and feels and looks more expensive than it is! I definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Lila R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box. Arrived in a timely fashion and has room to sort out your jewelry into sections
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Reed

customer_reviews.title: Too tiny to be useful.
customer_reviews.text: Too tiny to be useful. Takes up little space but holds just as little. Really cute and quality feel. Will see if I can find a bigger one
customer_reviews.author: Frugalliving

customer_reviews.title: Good color...very chic.
customer_reviews.text: Love the many compartments, although its too small. I will order a larger size. soon!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Cute, great quailty, but tricky layout.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this! It’s a great quality and super stylish. The only downfall, for me, is that I have a lot of big earrings that won’t fit in the box with how it’s laid out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so cute! almost ordered 2, cause it's not quite large enough for my needs
customer_reviews.author: juleswalls

customer_reviews.title: Love the grey
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but got the job done. Love the grey. Very modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley LaMantia

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This box is great, plenty of space. Very clean lines, simple and modern looking.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The box works, durable and fulfills its purpose. No complaint here

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for! It is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! It is a bit small so if you have a lot of necklaces you may want to get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha brown

customer_reviews.title: Not a pandora Jewely box but nice
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was pandora, bc my daughter wanted a pandora Jewely box and it was t but she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Frances Mims

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box was amazing!! I was scared because of some of the reviews but I’m SO glad I went ahead with the order. The fact it came with a cute little key to lock it so my 9 year daughter can’t go through it without permission, makes it even more great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my jewelry, very good quality and organized. Love it
customer_reviews.author: mlin

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a little flumsy box!! But to my surprise the picture on Amazon doesn't do it justice. Let me tell you the coloring is amazing. I choose red and it's is beautiful. It's have alot of space in it to store your jewelry. It's sheer elegance💞💞💞💞💞💞
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: I loved mine!❤💍
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a woman with a smaller jewelry collection or for the woman that wants a specific jewelry box for her favorite jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Airel Novella

customer_reviews.title: Small, but plenty for all my jewelry.  And good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality Jewelry box at a good price. It has a lot of compartments, and unless you're Ivanka Trump it likely can hold most of your stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboythecat

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Bought for daughter and myself!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and functional! I bought a grey one for myself and later bought a pink one for my daughter! We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful jewelry box.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 10 year old daughter. She loves the color and was excited to organize hell her jewelry in this box.

product_meta.title: Vlando Wooden Jewelry Box, Jewelry Organizer and Storage- Grey
feature_bullets: Vlando is a Trademark Exclusivily Designing and Crafting Premium Jewelry Boxes. Visit Us By Clicking on Miss Vlando Store to View Our Full Offering of Jewelry Boxes.
VLANDO Pandora is a medium sized jewelry boxed designed to store your favorite accessories.
SPECIFICATIONS: L 8.3 x W 5.9 x H 3.9 inches.
MATERIALS: Made from durable synthetic leather and a velvet lining, the Pandora has a unique style, concealing all your accessories.

INCLUDES: The lid contains a large mirror while the upper level has 4 ring holder slots, 4 small compartments and one large closing compartment in the middle. Lift the upper level to uncover a secret space with up to 7 more storage spaces offering space to store your rings, earrings, chain necklaces, small watches, thin bracelets and cuffs.
GIFTING: Delights those who receive it as a present.
